hero.title: Build Your Next SaaS Product
hero.subtitle: A complete SaaS template with authentication, dashboard, user management, and modern React frontend. Get started building your next great idea.
hero.noCard: No credit card required, free to use basic features upon registration

features.title: Everything You Need to Build a SaaS
features.subtitle: Complete solution with authentication, payments, dashboard, and more

feature1.title: Authentication & User Management
feature1.description: Complete user system with registration, login, password reset, and profile management

feature2.title: Modern React Frontend
feature2.description: Built with React 18, TypeScript, TanStack Router, and Chakra UI for beautiful interfaces

feature3.title: FastAPI Backend
feature3.description: Scalable Python backend with FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and automated API documentation

feature4.title: Ready for Production
feature4.description: Docker containerization, CI/CD pipeline, and deployment scripts included

feature5.title: Multi-language Support
feature5.description: Internationalization ready with i18next for global audiences

feature6.title: Admin Dashboard
feature6.description: User management, system monitoring, and administrative tools built-in

testimonials.title: What Developers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by developers building the next generation of SaaS products

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: This template saved us months of development time. The code quality is excellent.

testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonial2.content: Perfect starting point for our SaaS. Everything we needed was already there.

testimonial3.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial3.content: Clean architecture and well-documented. Made our development process smooth.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about the SaaS template

faq1.question: What technologies are included?
faq1.answer: React 18, TypeScript, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Docker, and more.

faq2.question: Is it production ready?
faq2.answer: Yes, includes Docker, CI/CD, monitoring, and deployment configurations.

faq3.question: Can I customize it?
faq3.answer: Absolutely! The template is designed to be easily customizable.

faq4.question: What about documentation?
faq4.answer: Comprehensive documentation and examples are included.

cta.title: Ready to Build Your SaaS?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who have built successful products with our template
